body: This appears to be missing from the TD mod and packaging scripts.
Added it to the TD mod and the packaging scripts.
Finally! What took so damn long? What am I paying you people for?
ircd should be up at irc.openra.net now, check it to see if it's satisfying?
Connection is much faster now, but somehow my client can't join channels.
Registration? It's not running any services if that's what you're talking about. How about establishing the connection when a mod is loaded, join channels when joining lobby?
No, I don't mean that. Registration is just the IRC-themed word for the connection handshake. The code is trying to join a channel before the handshake is completed, which is wrong.
Moved the join and that immediately fixed it. Also connection to irc.openra.net is way faster than to FreeNode.

Looks like you cannot see usernames. Also it should check if the nick you choose works with IRC actually - it allows having spaces in the nick although it cannot join to the channel then.

Looks good so far tho.

> Looks like you cannot see usernames.

That is because irc.openra.net #lobby is currently empty.
I was logged in via my IRC client too. I could even kick my OpenRA-instance out.

Can't get the random crashes under control:

Redid this with another library that does not have threading issues. https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/8636
